author: D. R.A. Lloyd
subject: Re:Tidbits
body: Further examination of the Nicotine Satisfaction data shows that Philip Morris smokers' nicotine intake per cigarette is not significantly different than the overall population, and that compensation (minimum nicotine requirement) occurs at the same level (T/NN 14, FTC this investigation nicotine/cig. 6). In all aspects, PM smokers appear very much like typical the overall population.
